alert.note: Alert for East Laramie County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 9:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Scotts Bluff, northwestern Kimball, western Banner, southwestern Sioux, southeastern Goshen and northeastern Laramie Counties through 1045 PM MDT... At 944 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Torrington to 6 miles east of Gun Barrel. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lyman around 955 PM MDT. Albin around 1000 PM MDT. Morrill around 1005 PM MDT. Mitchell around 1020 PM MDT. Scottsbluff, Gering and Terrytown around 1040 PM MDT. Lake Alice around 1045 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Henry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
